title: Don't Worry, Be Happy
description:
Jillian and the crew tackle ways to combat the crippling effects of worrying! Plus, strategies to combat snoring, mastering your overhead squat, avoiding injuries during exercise, and quick fixes to improve posture. 


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ


This Week's Sponsor Codes:

Sagely Naturals: Sagelynaturals.com, promo code JILLIAN at checkout for 20% off your first order

Alaya Naturals: AlayaNaturals.com, promo code JMPOD for 15% off

Rothy’s: Rothys.com, promo code jillian for free shipping

Ascent Protein: Ascentprotein.com/JILLIAN, promo code JMASCENT for 20% off  

LinkedIn: LinkedIn.com/JILLIAN to get $50 off your first job post

Robinhood: jillian.robinhood.com for a free stock like Apple, Ford, or Sprint

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
